sentences.sContent: ...and in most places you can't buy alcohol at drive-through facilities...
...The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions...
...So here's a suggestion offered by two researchers at the Rand Corporation: Why not take a lesson from alcohol control policies and apply them to where food is sold and how it's displayed...
...Display and sales restrictions: California has a rule prohibiting alcohol displays near the cash registers in gas stations...
...So here's a suggestion offered by two researchers at the Rand Corporation: Why not take a lesson from alcohol control policies and apply them to where food is sold and how it's displayed...
...The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions...
...These make alcohol less easy to get and reduce the number of psychological cues to drink...
...Display and sales restrictions: California has a rule prohibiting alcohol displays near the cash registers in gas stations...
...so perhaps the comparison between sugar and alcohol or tobacco shouldn’t come as a surprise...
...Sugar poses enough health risks that it should be considered a controlled substance just like alcohol and tobacco...

phrases.pCn: 脂肪醇；脂肪族醇；高级醇

words.tran: 酗酒；[内科] 酒精中毒
醇化；变成酒精；浸渍酒精中

trans.tranOther: the chemical substance in alcoholic drinks that can make you drunk, which is also used in other types of products
